messages.subject: Re: reply to (Shyrley) re: Christianity and "witchcraft"
messages.msgSnippet: Re: reply to Sandra re: Christianity and witchcraft ... a vehicle for Satan to use... ... Scuse but MB did not mention Satanism.  She seems to be speaking
messages.messageBody:
Re: reply to Sandra re: Christianity and "witchcraft"

>> mamabethuscg@y... writes: ...there IS real "witch craft" and it is
a vehicle for Satan to use...

>Witchcraft and Satanism are not the same thing... Shyrley

'Scuse but MB did not mention Satanism. She seems to be speaking
from within the understandings of Biblical Christianity, but I
won't "teach" you the concepts here. It puzzles me on this list how
people who supposedly let their children learn on their own motive
and schedule, somehow feel free to correct the other adults without
necessarily even reading what they said carefully.

Perhaps this is how threads wind (or unwind?) into completely
different topics... some buzz-word triggers a person onto a pet theme
or soapbox... things that make you go, "huh?"
~Kit
